dataManagers

Class ApproverClaimListManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataManagers.ClaimListManager
      • dataManagers.ApproverClaimListManager

  • public class ApproverClaimListManager
extends ClaimListManager
    The ApproverClaimListManager is the base class for all elastic web server connections which allow an application to draw claims from the webserver onto the approver's claims list
    Since:
    1.0

      Would remove a claims but approvers cannot currently do this

      Automatically saves current claims to the elastic web server
